name: Find the bomb!
description:
Find the Bomb!

Find the man with a bomb among the people! Look for the explosive belt and stop the man before he can kill the people. But watch out!  You have only one try: When you pick the wrong person or react too late it is game over. As the levels progress, it will get harder to spot him, because the crowd grows steadily. Will you react fast enough or will the bomb explode?
